screen_desc: The screenshot shows a search result page on Costco's website for "LG ultragear" gaming monitors. There are two monitors listed, with the first one priced at $299.99 and the second one priced at $999.99 after a $600 discount. The page allows for sorting by Best Match and filtering options. Users can also add the monitors to their cart.
action_think: The user wants to empty the shopping cart and add an LG Ultragear monitor to Costco's cart. I need to navigate to the cart page first and then select the desired item from the search results to add it to the cart.
action_plan: Navigate to the Costco cart page
Scroll up to the top of the page
Click on the LG Ultragear monitor
Click on the 'Add' button next to the monitor price
action_desc: Navigate to the Costco cart page
action_result: The user is now viewing a list of products on Costco's website, specifically searching for "lg ultragear". This is a step towards completing the user request, as the user needs to find and select the specific products to add to the cart.
